  Number.isInteger(input) && input > 1950 && input < moment().format("YYYY")
    ? true
    : "Please Enter a valid Year";

components.label: Total Average Monthly Gross Profit
components.calculateValue:
value =
  row.monthlygrossprofit + row.monthlygrossprofitotherthancar
    ? Math.round(
        (row.monthlygrossprofit +
          row.monthlygrossprofitotherthancar +
          Number.EPSILON) *
          100
      ) / 100
    : 0;
